node.name: Snipper - Code Sharing Service
node.shortdescription: Snipper is an easy way to share code with developers through Twitter. Provided as a plugin for Eclipse(initially); developers can select a file or snippet of text in an editor and share it on Twitter. Check out the about">http://snipper.rockstarapps.com.s3.amazonaws.com/about.html">about page for more information.
node.body: Snipper is an easy way to share code with developers through Twitter. Provided as a plugin for Eclipse(initially); developers can select a file or snippet of text in an editor and share it on Twitter. Check out the about">http://snipper.rockstarapps.com.s3.amazonaws.com/about.html">about page for more information.
